title: Fix connector account matching: prevent incorrect customer merges from email/domain heuristics

sections.text: Account matching during CSV/Zendesk/Intercom ingest can incorrectly link conversations to the wrong customer when domains are shared (subsidiaries, resellers, freemail) or when multiple accounts use the same support email. Update the matching logic to require higher-confidence signals (e.g., verified domain + known CRM account mapping) and fall back to an “unmatched” state rather than auto-linking on ambiguous matches. Add logging/metrics for match decisions and surface a review queue entry for ambiguous cases so impacted-customer counts and revenue exposure aren’t misattributed.
